rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Telling me to show you around the BLADE Area
when you aren't even part of BLADE yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Uncle Nagi is totally planning
to make you a BLADE member, isn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0002_m
rows.name:
Uncle Nagi is totally planning
to make you a BLADE member, isn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0002_f
rows.name:
Uncle Nagi is totally planning
to make you a BLADE member, isn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0003
rows.name: The BLADE Area is different from the other areas[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's an area where all the facilities needed
by BLADE members are gathered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Dolls are just so cool, aren't they~[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Question

rows.label: xs01050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what a Doll is.

rows.label: xs01050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Enthusiasm

rows.label: xs01050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Gaze longingly at the Doll.

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0006
rows.name: It's that robot that just went by![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0007
rows.name: We call them Dolls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0008
rows.name:
They're awesome machines that can completely transform
from humanoid to vehicle form![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0009
rows.name:
They attack with beam weapons,
defend with barriers[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0010
rows.name: They're superweapons that make all your dreams come true![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0011
rows.name: You get it, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0011_m
rows.name: You get it, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0011_f
rows.name: You get it, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Exactly!
Dolls are just pure awesome![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Beams, transformations...
Just hearing about it gets you pumped, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0014
rows.name:
You want to shout special attack names
in the cockpit, right? Right??[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0015
rows.name: Totally~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0016
rows.name: Ah, by the way, I[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0017
rows.name:
For the day I finally get to pilot a Doll,
I've already come up with special move names![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0018
rows.name:
They're saved on my [System:Ruby rt=debaisu ]terminal[/System:Ruby],
so just wait a sec![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0019
rows.name: Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0020
rows.name: S-Sorry! I got carried away[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Originally, they were weapons created assuming battles
with aliens who could potentially threaten Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Faced with such a powerful alien civilization,
saving Earth just wasn't possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0023
rows.name: Still, after crash-landing on Mira[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0024
rows.name:
the fact that we could rebuild NLA this much
in little over two months is[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
thanks to humanity's will to survive
and the power of the Dolls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0026
rows.name:
You look like you want to pilot one, but
you can't just yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0027
rows.name:
To pilot a Doll, you obviously have to be a BLADE member,
but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0028
rows.name: you also need a Doll License.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Like I said before, Dolls
were developed as weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0030
rows.name: If they're used incorrectly, it could lead to a major accident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
That's why only those who pass the test
are allowed to pilot Dolls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Hearing that, you probably want to take
the Doll License test, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0033
rows.name:
It's not a test you can just go and take
because you want to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0034
rows.name: As a BLADE member[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Your level of contribution to BLADE, of course, but also your
contribution to the people of NLA must be recognized[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0036
rows.name:
Only then do you get qualified by BLADE HQ
to take the test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0037
rows.name: Let's do our best![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0038
rows.name:
If you steadily complete missions,
you're sure to get the call someday![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0039
rows.name: Lin's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0040
rows.name:
Okay, I'll guide you to the place with the Quest Board
where you can accept those missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0041
rows.name: Well then, let's go right away![ST:wait ]
